S02psarkdhu:0_1: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
S02psarkdhu:1_0: namo bhagavate śākyamunaye mahākāruṇikāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya /
S02psarkdhu:1_2_0: oṃ giri giri giriṇi giriṇi girivati guṇavati ākāśavati ākāśaviśuddhe sarvapāpavigate
S02psarkdhu:1_2_1: ākāśe gaganatale ākāśavicāriṇi maṇidhari vajriṇi jvalitaśikhare maṇimuktākhacitamaulidhare
S02psarkdhu:1_2_2: sukeśe suveṣe suvaktre sunetre suvarṇagaure atīte anutpanne anāgate pratyutpanne
S02psarkdhu:1_2_3: namaḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ jvalitaujasāṃ buddhe subuddhe bhagavati surakṣaṇi akṣaya sukṣaya
S02psarkdhu:1_2_4: sūkṣme suprabhe sudame sudānte suvrate varade pravare bhagavati bhadravati subhadravati
S02psarkdhu:1_2_5: bhadre subhadre vimale jayabhadre caṇḍi pracaṇḍi caṇḍe vajracaṇḍe mahācaṇḍe gauri
S02psarkdhu:1_2_6: gandhāri caṇḍāli mātaṅgi vaccasi sumati pukkasi sumukhi śabari śāvari śaṃkari dramaṇḍi
S02psarkdhu:1_2_7: drāmaṇḍi raudriṇi sarvārthasādhani paramārthasādhani hana hana sarvaśatrūn daha daha
S02psarkdhu:1_2_9: jīvitaṃ sarvaduṣṭagrahāṇāṃ nāśaya naśaya sarvapāpāni me bhagavati /
S02psarkdhu:1_3: rakṣa rakṣa mama sarvasattvānāñ ca sarvatra sarvadā sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ /
S02psarkdhu:1_5_0: sarvakilviṣanāśani mārtaṇḍe mṛtyudaṇḍe mṛtyudaṇḍanivāriṇi mānande mānini mahāmānini
S02psarkdhu:1_5_1: mānadhāriṇi cale vicale vimale viṭi viṭi taṭi tiṭi niṭi niṭi tuṭṭe dhoriṇi dhariṇi
S02psarkdhu:1_5_2: nimiṇi viriṇi vīryaṇi pracale pravarasamare caṇḍāli mātaṅgi rundhasi karasi śarasi
S02psarkdhu:1_5_3: varcasi sumati pukkasi śabari śabari śaṃkari mani draviḍi ḍāviḍi hanani dahani pacani
S02psarkdhu:1_5_4: pācani marddani sarali sarale saralambhe hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavidāriṇi mahiri mahiri mahāmahili
S02psarkdhu:1_5_5: nigaḍe nigaḍabhaṃje marte marte matti mattini dāṃte cakre cakravākini jvale jvale
S02psarkdhu:1_5_6: jvalini śabari śābari sarvavyādhihariṇi muni muni cuṇḍi cuṇḍi cuṇḍini cuṇḍini mahācuṇḍini
S02psarkdhu:1_5_7: nimi nimi nimiṃdhari trailokyavardhani trilokajanani trilokālokakari traidhātukavyavalokani
S02psarkdhu:1_5_9: māṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca sarvasthānagata sarvaduṣṭabhayebhyaḥ sarvamanuṣyāmanuṣyabhayebhyaḥ
S02psarkdhu:1_6: vajre vajre vajravati vajradhare vajrapāṇidhare hiri hiri mili mili kili kili cili cili śili śili cala cala vala vala varade [Pkdh_142] varadāṃkuśe sarvatra jayalabdhe svāhā /
S02psarkdhu:1_7: sarvapāpavidāriṇi svāhā / sarvavyādhihariṇi svāhā / garbhasaṃbharaṇi svāhā / sarvatra bhayaharaṇi svāhā / svasti bhavatu mama sarvasattvānāñ ca svāhā /
S02psarkdhu:1_8: oṃ bhuvaḥ svāhā / svasti svāhā / śānti svāhā / puṣṭi svāhā / balavarddhani svāhā / oṃ jayatu jayavati jayakamale vimale svāhā /
S02psarkdhu:1_9: vipule svāhā / sarvatathāgatamūrte svāhā / oṃ bhūri mahāśānte svāhā / oṃ bhuḥ bhūri bhūri vajravati sarvatathāgatahṛdayapūraṇi āyuḥsandhāraṇi bale balavati /
S02psarkdhu:1_10: oṃ jayavijaye hūm hūṃ phaṭ / oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi hūm hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā /
S02psarkdhu:1_11: / oṃ maṇivajre hṛdayavajre mārasainyavidrāvaṇi hana hana sarvaśatrūn vajragarbhe trāsaya trāsaya sarvamārabhavanāni hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ saṃbhara saṃbhara svāhā /
